actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: To amend the Act of September 18, 1978 (92 Stat. 712) providing for the extension of certain Federal benefits, services, and assistance to the Pasqua Yaqui Indians of Arizona, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Extends Federal recognition to the Pasqua Yaqui Indians of Arizona.

titles.title: To amend the Act of September 18, 1978 (92 Stat. 712) providing for the extension of certain Federal benefits, services, and assistance to the Pasqua Yaqui Indians of Arizona, and for other purposes.
